question: Can the fast of 15th of Sha'ban also be intended to make up for the fast of Ramadan one missed
answer:
QUESTION

Can the fast of 15th of Sha'ban also be intended to make up for the fast of Ramadan one missed

 

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh  

It is not permissible to intend to keep the Qadha of a Ramadaan fast while observing the Nafl fast of the 15th Shabaan.

And Allah knows best 

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
